main.description: A biodiversity observation record following Darwin Core standards. Represents a single occurrence of an organism at a specific place and time.

scientificName.description: The full scientific name of the observed organism, following Darwin Core dwc:scientificName.

eventDate.description: The date-time when the observation occurred, in ISO 8601 format (Darwin Core dwc:eventDate).

location.description: Geographic location information for the observation.

verbatimLocality.description: The original textual description of the place (Darwin Core dwc:verbatimLocality).

blobs.description: Array of image references documenting the observation.

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the observation.

license.description: SPDX license identifier for this observation (maps to Dublin Core dcterms:license).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when this record was created.

taxonId.description: External taxon identifier (e.g., gbif:2878688). Prefixed with source.

taxonRank.description: The taxonomic rank of the scientific name (e.g., species, genus, family).

vernacularName.description: Common name for the taxon (Darwin Core dwc:vernacularName).

kingdom.description: Taxonomic kingdom (e.g., Animalia, Plantae) (Darwin Core dwc:kingdom).

location.description: Geographic coordinates following Darwin Core standards.

decimalLatitude.description: The geographic latitude in decimal degrees (Darwin Core dwc:decimalLatitude). Valid range: -90 to 90.

decimalLongitude.description: The geographic longitude in decimal degrees (Darwin Core dwc:decimalLongitude). Valid range: -180 to 180.

coordinateUncertaintyInMeters.description: The horizontal distance (in meters) from the given coordinates describing the smallest circle containing the whole of the Location (Darwin Core dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters).

geodeticDatum.description: The ellipsoid, geodetic datum, or spatial reference system used (Darwin Core dwc:geodeticDatum). Defaults to WGS84.

continent.description: The name of the continent (Darwin Core dwc:continent).

country.description: The name of the country or major administrative unit (Darwin Core dwc:country).

countryCode.description: The standard code for the country (Darwin Core dwc:countryCode). ISO 3166-1-alpha-2.

stateProvince.description: The name of the next smaller administrative region than country (Darwin Core dwc:stateProvince).

county.description: The full, unabbreviated name of the next smaller administrative region than stateProvince (Darwin Core dwc:county).

municipality.description: The full, unabbreviated name of the next smaller administrative region than county (Darwin Core dwc:municipality).

locality.description: The specific description of the place (Darwin Core dwc:locality).

waterBody.description: The name of the water body in which the location occurs (Darwin Core dwc:waterBody).

minimumElevationInMeters.description: The lower limit of the range of elevation in meters (Darwin Core dwc:minimumElevationInMeters).

maximumElevationInMeters.description: The upper limit of the range of elevation in meters (Darwin Core dwc:maximumElevationInMeters).

minimumDepthInMeters.description: The lesser depth of a range of depth below the local surface in meters (Darwin Core dwc:minimumDepthInMeters).

maximumDepthInMeters.description: The greater depth of a range of depth below the local surface in meters (Darwin Core dwc:maximumDepthInMeters).

imageEmbed.description: A reference to an uploaded image blob.

alt.description: Alt text description of the image for accessibility.

aspectRatio.description: Width and height of an image, used for proper display before loading.
